org.catechis.dto
Class RatesOfForgetting

java.lang.Object
  org.catechis.dto.RatesOfForgetting

public class RatesOfForgetting
extends java.lang.Object

This _bean_ has do do more than most. The rate of forgetting information requires more inside its methods.

There are reading, writing, and eventually speaking and listening types.

There are the number of allowed levels: now 0-3 (these should really be from the users options file)

Then the rates are stored as milleseconds.
